name: Frontend Developer
description: Frontend developers are responsible for implementing the visual elements of a web application that users interact with directly. They collaborate with designers to bring user interfaces to life, ensuring applications are user-friendly, responsive, and visually appealing.

name: Backend Developer
description: Backend developers focus on server-side logic, databases, and API integrations. They work to ensure data flow between the server and frontend, handling the application's core logic and database interactions.

name: Full Stack Developer
description: Full stack developers work across both the frontend and backend, possessing skills in both areas. They handle end-to-end development, creating complete applications from the client to the server.

name: Mobile Developer
description: Mobile developers build applications for mobile platforms, like Android and iOS. They focus on creating intuitive and responsive applications that work seamlessly on mobile devices.

name: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps engineers focus on integrating development and operations processes to streamline code deployment and maintain server infrastructure. They work on automation, deployment, and monitoring to ensure reliable software releases.

name: QA Engineer
description: QA engineers ensure software quality by testing applications to catch bugs, usability issues, and performance bottlenecks. They work with both developers and product teams to validate requirements and functionality.
